#summary Where to download msrp4j

The current release of *msrp4j* is version *1.0.3* and is available here:

  * [https://s3.amazonaws.com/archie-public/msrp4j/msrp4j-1.0.3.jar msrp4j-1.0.3.jar]
  * [https://s3.amazonaws.com/archie-public/msrp4j/msrp4j-javadocs-1.0.3.zip msrp4j-javadocs-1.0.3.zip]
  * [https://s3.amazonaws.com/archie-public/msrp4j/msrp4j-sources-1.0.3.zip msrp4j-sources-1.0.3.zip]

Changes are noted [http://msrp4j.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/CHANGES.txt here].
